page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: { Spixworth Middle}has 269 children with an average of 26 per class, 10 classes,12 teachers.The pupils ages are from 8 to 12. Breaktimes are 15 minutes ,lunch hour is 1 hour 15 minutes. The school opened in 1970.It covers an area of 25,921 square metres . {Spixworth First}has 170 children with an average of 30 per class, 5 classes,7 teachers.The pupils ages are from 4-8 .Breaktimes 15 mins.,lunch hour,1 hour.The school opened in 1965.It covers an area of 8700 square metres. {Frettenham First}has 50 children with an average of 25 per class ,2 classes ,3 teachers.The pupils ages are from 4-8.Breaktimes are 15 minutes, lunch hour ,1 hour 15 minutes.The school opened in 1885.
